headers.name: APPLICATION-NAME
headers.description: Provide the name of the application performing this request

headers.name: APPLICATION-VERSION
headers.description: Provide the version of the application performing this request

headers.name: ON-BEHALF-OF-USER
headers.description: Provide the logon identifier of the end user this request is being actioned on behalf of

headers.name: ON-BEHALF-OF-IP-ADDRESS
headers.description: Provide the ip address of the end user this request is being actioned on behalf of

on_behalf_of.name: on_behalf_of
on_behalf_of.usage: Use this trait for resources that should require on behalf of headers

queryParameters.name: include_history
queryParameters.description: A Boolean value indicating wheather the API should use or return historacle records.

historical.name: historical
historical.usage: Use this trait for resources that could respond with historacle records

headers.name: X-CID
headers.description: A identifier which can be used for correlation to an downstream request

optional_correlating.name: optional_correlating
optional_correlating.usage: Use this trait for resources that could accept an optional correlation header

optional_pagination.name: optional_pagination
optional_pagination.usage: Use this trait for resources that could accept an optional pagination header
